Text.Value: Are you expecting sympathy?
Mother. You do not know what awaits you. Go - enter the Chamber of Loss and claim your prize. It may not be what you think.
Finish it? No - I want you to live, having lost everything. Leave.
I'm not done with you yet. My parents. Where are they?
Where are they?!
Sympathy is for the weak. I merely want to say my piece. I want you to know the cost of your education.
Shar had me do that, and I did. To cover my tracks. To usher you in.
And you threw it away.
Don't worry, Mother. I'll learn from your mistakes.
Lady Shar commanded me. And I obeyed. I do not question - I merely act as she wills me to.

EditorData.NodeContext: A little thrown by Shadowheart's question. Why ask what is obvious?

Text.Value: I won't remember you at all. Nobody will.
I won't remember you at all. Nobody will.
You became my mission. To take a child of Sel√ªne's most dedicated followers, and turn her over to Lady Shar. To show that all light fades, and darkness will prevail in the end.
Perhaps you have a greater capacity for cruelty than I credited you with. Aluve.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Chris] *REUSE* [Viconia] Same as LOW_SharGrotto_ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM - left hand on wound, stands up, turns and runs away.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)

Text.Value: They watched, as we moulded you. They watched. They wept. They bled - often at your hand. It may not be a happy reunion, but it will be a memorable one.
Leave. If you're wise, you'll vanish as if you're dead and buried.
Leave. Leave and vanish, or you'll wish I killed you here.
So you think you have won? Time will tell - far easier to claim something than hold onto it.
Why me? What was all this for?
You know nothing of what lies ahead. Go on - enter the Chamber of Loss. See for yourself.
I could demonstrate some techniques, if you insist.
They will turn on you, in time. When you hear the whispers, and see the blades drawn, remember my face.
Your parents are right through that door, in the Chamber of Loss. Where they have been all along. You saw them many times, only we made you forget.
Mercy? You were never one of us. Not truly. Aluve.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Chris] *REUSE* [Viconia] Same as LOW_SharGrotto_ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM - left hand on wound, stands up, turns and runs away.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)
EditorData.NodeContext: Veiled insult ('you're too soft') ah-LOO-veh ('I leave you')

Text.Value: All this was to make you into what the Dark Lady needed you to be - the planning. The training. Those deaths in Waterdeep. It was all to groom you to replace me at her right hand side.
I already wish you had - then perhaps you would have demonstrated some of the spine I sought to instil in you. Aluve.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Chris] *REUSE* [Viconia] Same as LOW_SharGrotto_ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM - left hand on wound, stands up, turns and runs away.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)
EditorData.NodeContext: Veiled insult ('you're too soft') ah-LOO-veh ('I leave you')

Text.Value: What are you talking about?
But they didn't forget.
There was a time when you would flirt with goodness and justice, Viconia - let Minsc and Boo be the last to reject your advances.

EditorData.NodeContext: Grim, looking down on Viconia - she once leaned towards redeeming herself, but has fallen too far

Text.Value: Are you sore, Mother Superior? You brought her to the same crossroads you yourself once stood at - but you cannot force her to follow.
Get out of here. If you're wise, you'll vanish for good.
You're lying. I wouldn't do that.

EditorData.stateContext: Viconia is on the floor, propped up by her right elbow. Her left hand is clasped to a wound in her side.

Text.Value: You can see for yourself easily enough. This was all for you, even though you have never appreciated it.
Kill her.
Finish it. Send me to Lady Shar's embrace.
I draw near, my Lady...

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Chris] *REUSE* [Shadowheart] Same as LOW_SharGrotto_ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM - Retrieve Cine Dagger and strike Viconia on the ground, killing her.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: SH strikes. Viconia speaks to her goddess with her last breath, and falls back, dead.
EditorData.NodeContext: Spoken to her deity in her moment of death
EditorData.SFXTags: [KC] A slash as the player strikes Viconia with a dagger
EditorData.VFXTags: [KC] A blood spray as the player strikes Viconia with a dagger

Text.Value: I've heard enough - leave. Vanish, or you'll wish I killed you here.
Oh I have seen you at work. More than you realise.
Answer me.
Why me? What was all this for?
Kill her.
I'm not done with you yet. My parents. Where are they?
So blunt - have you forgotten all the interrogation techniques I taught you? Where is the finesse?

I had an enclave in Waterdeep, you know. Much grander than this. Shar ordered me to raze it, kill all who followed me - claim they betrayed me, when in fact I slew those who showed nothing but loyalty.

EditorData.NodeContext: Bitterness creeping in. 'I had it all, and was forced to sacrifice it'

Synopsis: Shadowheart deals with Viconia after she has been defeated. Different flows for Shar Path and Enemy of Shar path.
